short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the number of Pull Request approvals

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds the number of approvals on pull requests when browsing

Follow these instructions to enable this extension on private repositories: https://github.com/MarceloAlves/chrome-github-approval-count#private-repository

For more details, visit https://github.com/MarceloAlves/chrome-github-approval-count
